methods: abstract PendingResult<DataTypeResult> createCustomDataType(GoogleApiClient client, DataTypeCreateRequest request) Defines a new data type which is added to the Google Fit platform on behalf of the current application.
abstract PendingResult<Status> disableFit(GoogleApiClient client) Disables Google Fit for an app.
abstract PendingResult<DataTypeResult> readDataType(GoogleApiClient client, String dataTypeName) Returns a data type with the specified dataTypeName.
